name: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri: Hiky? o Motomete
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 40MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 40MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com



?Game description
“Kawa No Nushi Zuri” is a title from the “Honoboro Zuri RPG” series that was born in 1990.
This title is the first in the series to be released on PlayStation®. Players can play with each of the 6 members of a family who want to fish the “Nushi” for their own purposes. Game system easy to learn even for beginners, a rich line-up of fishing poles and fishing methods as well as over 70 types of fishing guarantee a challenging fishing experience.

?Support the vibration function of DUALSHOCK®3.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
40MB
